md:
giải nghĩa từ "donations" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Donations (noun) - Sự quyên góp

+ Donations are gifts of money or goods to a charity or cause.

Example: The charity received many donations after the natural disaster.

* Related words: charity, gift, contribute, fundraising.

* Donations (noun) - Đóng góp

+ Donations are contributions of money or effort to a project or organization.

Example: The company made significant donations to the community development project.

* Related words: contribution, sponsor, funding, volunteer.

Note: Depending on the context, "donations" can be translated to "sự quyên góp" or "đóng góp".
